name: Ghoul - The Ritual
description:
The game revolves around a couple who gets in an accident, when unconscious the woman gets kidnapped by cultists, the man wakes up from her scream and now has to look for her in the forest.

This was made in 2 weeks in unity to enhance our skills more and to learn teamwork or pair programming. 

Controls
Movement - W,A,S,D or Arrow keys
Interact - E
Flashlight - F
Recharge Flashlight - R
Pause - Esc
